ygData.subject: Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: Along those same lines has anyone tried to make magic jewelry with the higher gems? I ve seen several like Wolf s Eye Agate and Emerald... As someone already
ygData.messageBody:
Along those same lines has anyone tried to make magic jewelry with the
higher gems? I've seen several like Wolf's Eye Agate and Emerald... As
someone already posted Highpass Hold DOES have a large selection of gems, I
went there yesterday to get my level 8 pet and it was certainly worth it.
This pet can damn near solo a wisp. Keep us posted on the new gem results,
it's hard to believe that the best thing silver can make is +5 mana

>From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>
>Make harder rings. There are at least 6 stones harder than jade. I am at
>skill 28 and I am pretty much finished with Jade rings. Jade has given me
>skills already and each stone will only give a few points. I also noticed
>that your skill advances faster if you practice soon after leveling, and
>personally I always like to sit at a table to do my work, and it seems to
>cut down on the failures a bit
>
>Cogg- Rallos Zek
>
>At 09:04 AM 5/3/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>
> >
> >This really got me mad yesterday. I put as many training points as I
> >could into Jewelcraft. I then sunk 40 platinum into the skill. I sold
> >all the stuff I made and put it back into the skill. This got me to a
> >skill of 37 where I was combining Amber and silver. I was in Freeport at
> >the time and my skill was rising very fast I thought. Last night I sunk
> >over 70 platinum into the skill. I went up a notch to using Jade and
> >enchanted silver to make Mana Rings. In 20 attempts I made 13 rings and
> >got NO SKILL IMPROVEMENT AT ALL. What gives? Am I doing something
> >wrong? I thought my 70 platinum investment would get me to at least 40
> >skill or higher. Now I'm broke, but I have yet to sell the Jade rings
> >because I was tired and frustrated. If I can get 7-8 platinum per ring I
> >should get most of my money back. I would appreciate any help here guys.
> >
> >Also, I found my success rate making jewelry better when I had full
> >mana. I don't know if this was just a coincidence or not.
> >
> >Thanks.
> >
